text: Edythe Broad (/bro äd/; born Edythe Lawson in 1936) is an American art collector and philanthropist. With her husband Eli, she has collected "about 2000 pieces of art valued at more than $2 billion" and supported arts initiatives such as the Los Angeles Opera and The Broad. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American billionaires Category:Philanthropists from Michigan Category:Businesspeople from Detroit
title: Edythe Broad
